verses.verse: Now the Philistines <WH6430> gathered <WH6908> together all <WH3605> their armies <WH4264> to Aphek, <WH663> while the Israelites <WH3478> were camping <WH2583> by the spring <WH9407> which <WH834> is in Jezreel. <WH3157>

And the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> were proceeding <WH5674> on by hundreds <WH3967> and by thousands, <WH505> and David <WH1732> and his men <WH376> were proceeding <WH5674> on in the rear <WH314> with Achish. <WH397>

Then the commanders <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430> said, <WH559> "What <WH4100> [are] these <WH428> Hebrews <WH5680> [doing here]?" And Achish <WH397> said <WH559> to the commanders <WH8269> of the Philistines, <WH6430> "Is this <WH2088> not David, <WH1732> the servant <WH5650> of Saul <WH7586> the king <WH4428> of Israel, <WH3478> who <WH834> has been <WH1961> with me these <WH2088> days, <WH3117> or <WH176> [rather] these <WH2088> years, <WH8141> and I have found <WH4672> no <WH3808> fault <WH3972> in him from the day <WH3117> he deserted <WH5307> [to me] to this <WH2088> day <WH3117>?"

But the commanders <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430> were angry <WH7107> with him, and the commanders <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430> said <WH559> to him, "Make the man <WH376> go <WH7725> back, <WH7725> that he may return <WH7725> to his place <WH4725> where <WH834> <WH8033> you have assigned <WH6485> him, and do not let him go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to battle <WH4421> with us, lest <WH3808> in the battle <WH4421> he become <WH1961> an adversary <WH7854> to us. For with what <WH4100> could this <WH2088> [man] make <WH7521> himself acceptable <WH7521> to his lord <WH113>? [Would it] not [be] with the heads <WH7218> of these <WH1992> men <WH376>?

"Is this <WH2088> not David, <WH1732> of whom <WH834> they sing <WH9420> in the dances, <WH4246> saying, <WH559> 'Saul <WH7586> has slain <WH5221> his thousands, <WH505> And David <WH1732> his ten <WH7233> thousands <WH7233>'?"

Then Achish <WH397> called <WH7121> David <WH1732> and said <WH559> to him, "[As] the Lord <WH3068> lives, <WH2416> you [have been] upright, <WH3477> and your going <WH3318> out and your coming <WH935> in with me in the army <WH4264> are pleasing <WH2896> in my sight; <WH5869> for I have not found <WH4672> evil <WH9567> in you from the day <WH3117> of your coming <WH935> to me to this <WH2088> day. <WH3117> Nevertheless, you are not pleasing <WH2896> in the sight <WH5869> of the lords. <WH5633>
"Now <WH6258> therefore return, <WH7725> and go <WH1980> in peace, <WH7965> that you may not displease <WH6213> <WH7451> <WH5869> the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines. <WH6430>"

And David <WH1732> said <WH559> to Achish, <WH397> "But what <WH4100> have I done <WH6213>? And what <WH4100> have you found <WH4672> in your servant <WH5650> from the day <WH3117> when <WH834> I came <WH1961> before <WH6440> you to this <WH2088> day, <WH3117> that I may not go <WH935> and fight <WH3898> against the enemies <WH340> of my lord <WH113> the king <WH4428>?"

But Achish <WH397> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559> to David, <WH1732> "I know <WH3045> that you are pleasing <WH2896> in my sight, <WH5869> like an angel <WH4397> of God; <WH430> nevertheless <WH389> the commanders <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430> have said, <WH559> 'He must not go <WH5927> up with us to the battle. <WH4421>'

"Now <WH6258> then arise <WH7925> early <WH7925> in the morning <WH1242> with the servants <WH5650> of your lord <WH113> who <WH834> have come <WH935> with you, and as soon as you have arisen <WH7925> early <WH7925> in the morning <WH1242> and have light, <WH215> depart. <WH1980>"

So David <WH1732> arose <WH7925> early, <WH7925> he and his men, <WH376> to depart <WH1980> in the morning, <WH1242> to return <WH7725> to the land <WH776> of the Philistines. <WH6430> And the Philistines <WH6430> went <WH5927> up to Jezreel. <WH3157>
